allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add activity feed edit/delete, quantity presets, avatars, and leaderboard charts

- Activity feed entries can now be edited inline or deleted with confirmation
- Quick quantity selector buttons \(1x, 5x, 10x\) in the log points form
- Hide number input spinners for cleaner UI
- Add optimized team member avatars \(200x200, ~12KB each\)
- Display avatars in team list, activity feed, and leaderboard charts
- Add WeeklyLeaderboard component with line/bar chart views
- Add localStorage persistence with storage.ts utilities
- Add date utilities for week-based filtering
- Add CLAUDE.md for repository guidance

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Google OAuth, Supabase database, PWA support, and loading skeletons

Auth:
- Google OAuth with @quangoinc.com domain restriction
- Auto-register users from Google profile \(name, avatar\)
- Protected routes with middleware
- Sign out button in header

Database:
- Supabase integration for users and entries
- Replaced localStorage with database calls
- Async data loading with proper state management

PWA:
- Manifest.json with app metadata
- App icons \(192px, 512px\)
- Apple Web App support

UI:
- Loading skeleton components
- Toast notifications for undo/celebrations
- Mobile-friendly edit/delete buttons \(always visible on touch\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
